plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am orange and crunchy.
🌱 I grow under the ground.
🐰 Rabbits love to munch on me.

plant.question: I am tall and have leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I can be very big.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.

plant.question: I am red and juicy. I grow on a vine. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am often used in salads.
☀️ I like to grow in the sun.
🍝 You can make sauce from me.

plant.question: I am a flower that is often yellow. I turn my head to follow the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 My face looks like the sun.
☀️ I grow tall in a field.
🐿️ My seeds are a tasty snack.

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful petals. People often give me as a gift. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I come in many colors.
💧 I need water to grow.
💔 Be careful of my sharp points.

plant.question: I am a big, round vegetable. People carve faces into me for Halloween. What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 I am orange.
🍁 I grow in the fall.
👻 You can make a jack-o'-lantern out of me.

plant.question: I am a plant with a trunk, but I am short. I give you something sweet and juicy. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow in warm places.
🐒 Monkeys sometimes hang out in me.
🥥 I have a hard shell and white juice inside.

plant.question: I am a plant that grows in water. Frogs like to sit on my big, flat leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 You can find me in a pond.
🌸 I sometimes have a pretty flower.
💧 I float on the water's surface.

plant.question: I am a plant that is prickly and lives in the desert. I can store water inside me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I am often found in hot, dry places.
🏜️ Some people keep me as a houseplant.
💧 I don't need much water.

plant.question: I am a long, green vegetable that grows on a vine. I can be pickled and taste sour. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am often used to make pickles.
🥗 I am good in salads.
🌱 I need something to climb on.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, and I'm wet and cold. You need an umbrella when I'm around. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I come from clouds.
☔ You wear a raincoat when I fall.
🌧️ Plants need me to grow.

weather.question: I am big and yellow and give you light. I go away at night. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am in the sky during the day.
😎 I can make you hot.
🌻 Plants need me to grow.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and fall from the sky in the winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am very cold.
☃️ You can make a snowman with me.
🏔️ I cover the ground.

weather.question: I am a strong wind that can knock things over. What am I?

hints.text: 🌬️ I can make trees sway.
🍃 I can blow leaves off trees.
🌪️ Sometimes I can be dangerous.

weather.question: I am white and float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am made of water droplets.
🐑 I can look like fluffy animals.
🌧️ Sometimes I turn gray and bring rain.

weather.question: I'm a colorful arc that appears after the rain. You need the sun to see me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
☀️ I appear when the sun shines after a rain.
✨ Some people think there's gold at the end of me.

weather.question: I am frozen rain that falls from the sky, and I can hurt if I hit you. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am made of ice.
🤕 It's best to stay inside when I fall.
🌧️ I start as rain.

weather.question: I am a loud noise in the sky that comes with lightning. What am I?

hints.text: 🌩️ I follow a flash of light.
👂 You can hear me.
⛈️ I happen during a storm.

weather.question: I am a flash of bright light in the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I come before thunder.
💥 I am very bright.
⛈️ I can be dangerous.

weather.question: I am a thick cloud near the ground that makes it hard to see. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ You can't see very far when I'm around.
🚗 Cars drive slowly when I'm present.
👻 I look like a ghost.
